articles.description: PSV are Eredivisie champions for a second consecutive season as they finish one point ahead of second-placed Ajax, whose late-season collapse cost them.

articles.description: England Test captain Ben Stokes says he has not had an alcoholic drink since the beginning of January.

articles.description: The blue smoke could be seen rising around Goodison Park almost four hours before kick-off. This grand old arena was not built for serene farewells, so a day of history and high emotion was never going to pass off quietly.
articles.title: Goodison Park: Emotional scenes mark Everton's last game at old ground
